languages.text: "Не понимаю, зачем вы упорствуете, {name}. К чему рисковать безопасностью своей команды ради предателей навигаторского Дома? Едва ли им нужна моя решимость, скорее — вырванное из груди сердце".

traits.locale_text: "Не понимаю, зачем вы упорствуете, {name}. К чему рисковать безопасностью своей команды ради горстки предателей? Едва ли им нужна моя решимость, скорее — вырванное из груди сердце".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."
languages.original_text: "Не понимаю, зачем вы упорствуете, {name}. К чему рисковать безопасностью своей команды ради предателей навигаторского Дома? Едва ли им нужна моя решимость, скорее — вырванное из груди сердце".

traits.locale_text: "I do not understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why risk the safety of your crew for a band of traitors to a Navigator House? They hardly wish to be impressed by my resolve, they would rather see my heart torn from my chest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why risk the safety of your crew for a band of traitors to a Navigator House? They hardly wish to be impressed by my resolve, they would rather see my heart torn from my chest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors to a Navigator House? They hardly wish to be impressed by my resolve—they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors to a Navigator House? They hardly wish to be impressed by my resolve—they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが固執する理由が分かりません、{name}様。どうして航宙士の家を裏切った一団のために、乗務員の安全を危険にさらすのですか？あたくしの決断で動くとは考えられません…むしろこの胸から心臓をもぎ取ってやろうと考えているのですから」
languages.original_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが固執する理由が分かりません、{name}様。どうして航宙士の家を裏切った一団のために、乗務員の安全を危険にさらすのですか？あたくしの決断で動くとは考えられません…むしろこの胸から心臓をもぎ取ってやろうと考えているのですから」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我不明白你为什么要这么执迷不悟，{name}。你为什么要为了导航者家族的一群叛徒，置你所有船员的安全于不顾？他们想看到的恐怕并不是我的决心，而是把我的心直接挖出来。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."

traits.locale_text: “我不明白你为什么要这么执迷不悟，{name}。你为什么要为了导航者家族的一群叛徒，置你所有船员的安全于不顾？他们想看到的恐怕并不是我的决心，而是把我的心直接挖出来。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne comprends pas pourquoi vous persistez dans cette voie, {name}. Pourquoi risquer la sécurité de votre équipage pour une bande de renégats ayant trahi une maison de navigateurs ? Ils n'ont que faire de ma détermination. Ils préféreraient autant m'arracher le cœur. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne comprends pas pourquoi vous persistez dans cette voie, {name}. Pourquoi risquer la sécurité de votre équipage pour une bande de renégats ayant trahi une maison de navigateurs ? Ils n'ont que faire de ma détermination. Ils préféreraient autant m'arracher le cœur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No logro entender su insistencia, {name}. ¿Por qué arriesgar la seguridad de su tripulación por un hatajo de rufianes que traicionó a una casa de Navegantes? Además, creo que preferirían arrancarme el corazón del pecho antes que reconocer mi determinación».
languages.original_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."

traits.locale_text: «No logro entender su insistencia, {name}. ¿Por qué arriesgar la seguridad de su tripulación por un hatajo de rufianes que traicionó a una casa de navegantes? Además, creo que preferirían arrancarme el corazón del pecho antes que dejarse impresionar por mi determinación».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr so darauf beharrt, {name}. Warum gefährdet Ihr für eine Bande von Verrätern aus einem Navigatorenhaus die Sicherheit Eurer Crew? Sie haben wohl kaum den Wunsch, meine Entschlossenheit sehen. Sie würden lieber sehen, dass mir das Herz aus der Brust gerissen wird."
languages.original_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr so darauf beharrt, {name}. Warum gefährdet Ihr für eine Bande von Verrätern an einem Navigatorenhaus die Sicherheit Eurer Crew? Sie haben wohl kaum den Wunsch, durch meine Entschlossenheit beeindruckt zu werden. Sie würden lieber sehen, dass mir das Herz aus der Brust gerissen wird."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu ısrarının sebebini anlayamıyorum {name}. Bir Rotacı Hanesi'nden bir grup hain için neden kendi mürettebatının canını riske atıyorsun? Hainler, azmimi kanıtlamamı istemiyor... Canımı almak istiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I cannot understand the reason for your persistence, {name}. Why put the safety of your crew on the line for a band of traitors from a Navigator House? They hardly wish to see my resolve — they would rather see my heart ripped out of my chest."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ısrarının sebebini anlayamıyorum {name}. Bir Rotacı Hanesi'nden bir grup hain için neden kendi mürettebatının canını riske atıyorsun? Hainler, azmimi kanıtlamamı istemiyor... Canımı almak istiyorlar."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
